title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.61 - Certified bed days available
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.61 - Certified bed days available

State Regulations

Bed days are computed by multiplying the number of
certified beds (excluding newborn) available throughout the period by the
number of days in the period. If there is an increase or decrease in the number
of certified beds available during the period, the number of certified beds
available for each part of the cost reporting period should be multiplied by
the number of days for which that number was available. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.61

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
